DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA
COMMITTEE
The Reverend Colman J. Barry, O.S.B.
President
St, Johnfs University
Collegeville, Minnesota
Dear Father Barry:
Thanks for your letter in support of the Public Television
Act of 1967,
I'll certainly give all the support I can and will start by
contacting Chairman Staggers right away,
I hope that both your own station activities and the network
you speak of can be established when this bill becomes law.
I appreciate hearing from you.
Best wishes.
Donald M, Fraser
